lines.text: I'm Larry. This is my brother Darryl. This is my other brother Darryl.

[final lines, Dick wakes up as Bob from "The Bob Newhart Show"]
I just had had the strangest dream. I just dreamt that I was married to a beautiful blonde and we owned an inn that was going to be turned into a golf club.

[wakes up, turns the light on]
That's it, no more shrimp before bed.
[turns light off]

[turns light back on, jealous]
Beautiful blonde?
Ick.
And what would you say if you weren't a college graduate?

[During Founders' Day, Dick has been placed in the stocks]
My nose itches.
[calling out]
Anybody! Stratch my nose! Anybody! OK, 5 bucks! Anybody, scratch my nose for 5 bucks!
Okay.
[Hands Dick $5 and scratches his nose]
Okay, anybody else, scratch my nose for 5 bucks!
Dick, I cleared out that obstruction in the chimney.
Thanks George. What was it?
I don't know but when I woke it up, it ran away.
[Holding back tears]
I discovered I like bowling.
[She starts crying]
I can't help it, I like that boy.
